org.springframework.shell.support.table

Class TableRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.shell.support.table.TableRenderer
  • Deprecated. 
    In favor of TableBuilder

    public final class TableRenderer
extends Object
    Contains utility methods for rendering data to a formatted console output. E.g. it provides helper methods for rendering ASCII-based data tables.
